fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022e3.equipments.heater

Interface ControlledHeaterImplementationI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HeaterImplementationI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ThermostatedHeater

    public interface ControlledHeaterImplementationI
extends HeaterImplementationI
    The class ControlledHeaterImplementationI declares the methods that a controlled heater must implement to implement the sensors and the actuators used by the controller.

    Description

    White-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2022-10-27

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
